title: Infinity and the extended real number system

blocks.name: cpnf
blocks.content: Plus infinity.
blocks.origin: const class cpnf { +‚àû }

blocks.name: diff.cpnf.s
diff.cpnf.c
diff.cpnf.w
cmnf
blocks.content: Minus infinity.
blocks.origin: const class cmnf { -‚àû }

blocks.name: diff.cmnf.s
diff.cmnf.c
diff.cmnf.w
cxr
blocks.content: The set of extended reals (includes plus and minus infinity).
blocks.origin: const class cxr { ‚Ñù* }

blocks.name: diff.cxr.s
diff.cxr.c
diff.cxr.w
clt
blocks.content: 'Less than' predicate (extended to include the extended reals).
blocks.origin: const class clt { < }

blocks.name: diff.clt.s
diff.clt.c
diff.clt.w
cle
blocks.content: Extend wff notation to include the 'less than or equal to' relation.
blocks.origin: const class cle { ‚â§ }

blocks.name: diff.cle.s
diff.cle.c
diff.cle.w
df-pnf
blocks.content: Define plus infinity. Note that the definition is arbitrary, requiring only that ` +oo ` be a set not in ` RR ` and different from ` -oo ` ( ~ df-mnf ). We use ` ~P U. CC ` to make it independent of the construction of ` CC ` , and Cantor's Theorem will show that it is different from any member of ` CC ` and therefore ` RR ` . See ~ pnfnre , ~ mnfnre , and ~ pnfnemnf . A simpler possibility is to define ` +oo ` as ` CC ` and ` -oo ` as ` { CC } ` , but that approach requires the Axiom of Regularity to show that ` +oo ` and ` -oo ` are different from each other and from all members of ` RR ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-mnf
blocks.content: Define minus infinity as the power set of plus infinity. Note that the definition is arbitrary, requiring only that ` -oo ` be a set not in ` RR ` and different from ` +oo ` (see ~ mnfnre and ~ pnfnemnf ). (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-xr
blocks.content: Define the set of extended reals that includes plus and minus infinity. Definition 12-3.1 of [Gleason] p. 173. (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: df-ltxr
blocks.content: Define 'less than' on the set of extended reals. Definition 12-3.1 of [Gleason] p. 173. Note that in our postulates for complex numbers, ` <RR ` is primitive and not necessarily a relation on ` RR ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: df-le
blocks.content: Define 'less than or equal to' on the extended real subset of complex numbers. Theorem ~ leloe relates it to 'less than' for reals. (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: pnfnre
blocks.content: Plus infinity is not a real number. (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: pnfnre2
blocks.content: Plus infinity is not a real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: mnfnre
blocks.content: Minus infinity is not a real number. (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: ressxr
blocks.content: The standard reals are a subset of the extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: rexpssxrxp
blocks.content: The Cartesian product of standard reals are a subset of the Cartesian product of extended reals. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 8-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: rexr
blocks.content: A standard real is an extended real. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: 0xr
blocks.content: Zero is an extended real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: renepnf
blocks.content: No (finite) real equals plus infinity. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 19-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: renemnf
blocks.content: No real equals minus infinity. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 19-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: rexrd
blocks.content: A standard real is an extended real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: renepnfd
blocks.content: No (finite) real equals plus infinity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: renemnfd
blocks.content: No real equals minus infinity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: pnfex
blocks.content: Plus infinity exists. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 8-Dec-2018.) (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 7-Dec-2022.)

blocks.name: pnfxr
blocks.content: Plus infinity belongs to the set of extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) (Proof shortened by Anthony Hart, 29-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: pnfexOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ pnfex as of 7-Dec-2022. Plus infinity exists. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 8-Dec-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: pnfnemnf
blocks.content: Plus and minus infinity are different elements of ` RR* ` . (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: mnfnepnf
blocks.content: Minus and plus infinity are different. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 8-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: mnfxr
blocks.content: Minus infinity belongs to the set of extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) (Proof shortened by Anthony Hart, 29-Aug-2011.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 19-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: rexri
blocks.content: A standard real is an extended real (inference form.) (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)

blocks.name: 1xr
blocks.content: ` 1 ` is an extended real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: renfdisj
blocks.content: The reals and the infinities are disjoint. (Contributed by NM, 25-Oct-2005.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 19-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: ltrelxr
blocks.content: "Less than" is a relation on extended reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltrelxr() {
  |- wss(clt, cxp(cxr, cxr))
} = {
  eqsstri(clt, cxp(cxr, cxr), cun(copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr))))
  df-ltxr(hs0, hs1)
  unssi(copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), cxp(cxr, cxr))
  sstri(copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), cxp(cxr, cxr), cxp(cr, cr))
  eqsstri(copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), cxp(cr, cr), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))))
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1))))
  df-3an(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))
  opabssxp(hs0, hs1, cr, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))
  rexpssxrxp()
  unssi(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), cxp(cxr, cxr))
  mp2an(wss(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(cxr, cxr)), wss(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), cxr), wss(csn(cpnf), cxr))
  unssi(cr, csn(cmnf), cxr)
  sstri(csn(cpnf), cxr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))
  snsspr1(cpnf, cmnf)
  xpss12(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), cxr, csn(cpnf), cxr)
  mp2an(wss(cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), cxp(cxr, cxr)), wss(csn(cmnf), cxr), wss(cr, cxr))
  sstri(csn(cmnf), cxr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))
  snsspr2(cmnf, cpnf)
  sseqtr4i(cpr(cpnf, cmnf), cxr, cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)))
  ssun2(cpr(cpnf, cmnf), cr)
  df-xr()
  ressxr()
  xpss12(csn(cmnf), cxr, cr, cxr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
}

thm ltrelxr() {
  ‚ä¢ < ‚äÜ(‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*)
} = {
  eqsstri(clt, (‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*), ({ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)} ‚ãÉ(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))))

  eqsstri({ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}, (‚Ñù √ó ‚Ñù), { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)‚àß hs0[<]hs1)})
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1), ((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)‚àß hs0[<]hs1))

  unssi(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû }), ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù), (‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*))
  mp2an(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚äÜ(‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*), (‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })‚äÜ ‚Ñù*, { +‚àû } ‚äÜ ‚Ñù*)
  unssi(cr, { -‚àû }, cxr)
  sstri({ +‚àû }, cxr, { +‚àû, -‚àû })
  snsspr1(cpnf, cmnf)
  xpss12((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû }), cxr, { +‚àû }, cxr)
  mp2an(({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù)‚äÜ(‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*), { -‚àû } ‚äÜ ‚Ñù*, ‚Ñù ‚äÜ ‚Ñù*)
  sstri({ -‚àû }, cxr, { +‚àû, -‚àû })
  snsspr2(cmnf, cpnf)
  sseqtr4i({ +‚àû, -‚àû }, cxr, (‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { +‚àû, -‚àû }))
  ssun2({ +‚àû, -‚àû }, cr)
  df-xr()
  ressxr()
  xpss12({ -‚àû }, cxr, cr, cxr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
}

blocks.name: xrlenlt
blocks.content: "Less than or equal to" expressed in terms of "less than", for extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrlenlt(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(clt))))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(clt))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cle))
  df-br(c0, cle, c1)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cle), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(clt)))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  opelxpi(c0, cxr, c1, cxr)
  baib(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cxr, cxr)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cle), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(clt))))
  bitri(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cle), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cxr, cxr)), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(clt)))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdif(cxp(cxr, cxr), ccnv(clt))))
  eleq2i(cop(c0, c1), cle, cdif(cxp(cxr, cxr), ccnv(clt)))
  df-le()
  eldif(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cxr, cxr), ccnv(clt))
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(clt)))
  syl6rbbr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(clt)), wcel(cop(c1, c0), clt))
  opelcnvg(c0, cxr, c1, cxr, clt)
  df-br(c1, clt, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xrlenlt(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí(c0[‚â§]c1 ‚Üî ¬¨ c1[<]c0))
} = {
  bitr4d((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), c0[‚â§]c1, ¬¨ c1[<]c0, ¬¨ < c0, c1 > ‚àà `' <)
  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), c0[‚â§]c1, ¬¨ < c0, c1 > ‚àà `' <, < c0, c1 > ‚àà ‚â§)
  df-br(c0, cle, c1)
  syl((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), (< c0, c1 > ‚àà ‚â§ ‚Üî ¬¨ < c0, c1 > ‚àà `' <), < c0, c1 > ‚àà(‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*))
  opelxpi(c0, cxr, c1, cxr)
  baib(< c0, c1 > ‚àà(‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*), < c0, c1 > ‚àà ‚â§, ¬¨ < c0, c1 > ‚àà `' <)
  bitri(< c0, c1 > ‚àà ‚â§, (< c0, c1 > ‚àà(‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*)‚àß ¬¨ < c0, c1 > ‚àà `' <), < c0, c1 > ‚àà((‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*)\ `' <))
  eleq2i(< c0, c1 >, cle, ((‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*)\ `' <))
  df-le()
  eldif(< c0, c1 >, (‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*), `' <)
  notbid((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), c1[<]c0, < c0, c1 > ‚àà `' <)
  syl6rbbr((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), c1[<]c0, < c0, c1 > ‚àà `' <, < c1, c0 > ‚àà <)
  opelcnvg(c0, cxr, c1, cxr, clt)
  df-br(c1, clt, c0)
}

blocks.name: ssxr
blocks.content: The three (non-exclusive) possibilities implied by a subset of extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 25-Oct-2005.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 19-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssxr(class c0) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, cxr), w3o(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0)))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wss(c0, cxr), w3o(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0)), wss(c0, cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))), wo(wo(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0)), wss(c0, cr)))
  orrd(wss(c0, cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))), wo(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0)), wss(c0, cr))
  syl5ib(wss(c0, cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))), wn(wo(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0))), wss(c0, cr), wceq(cin(c0, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), emptycls))
  syl5eq(cin(c0, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), emptycls, cun(cin(c0, csn(cpnf)), cin(c0, csn(cmnf))), wn(wo(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0))))
  eqtri(cin(c0, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), cun(cin(c0, csn(cpnf)), cin(c0, csn(cmnf))), cin(c0, cun(csn(cpnf), csn(cmnf))))
  ineq2i(c0, cpr(cpnf, cmnf), cun(csn(cpnf), csn(cmnf)))
  df-pr(cpnf, cmnf)
  indi(c0, csn(cpnf), csn(cmnf))
  3imtr3i(wn(wo(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0))), wceq(cun(cin(c0, csn(cpnf)), cin(c0, csn(cmnf))), emptycls), wa(wn(wcel(cpnf, c0)), wn(wcel(cmnf, c0))), wa(wceq(cin(c0, csn(cpnf)), emptycls), wceq(cin(c0, csn(cmnf)), emptycls)))
  biimpri(wa(wn(wcel(cpnf, c0)), wn(wcel(cmnf, c0))), wa(wceq(cin(c0, csn(cpnf)), emptycls), wceq(cin(c0, csn(cmnf)), emptycls)))
  anbi12i(wceq(cin(c0, csn(cpnf)), emptycls), wceq(cin(c0, csn(cmnf)), emptycls), wn(wcel(cpnf, c0)), wn(wcel(cmnf, c0)))
  disjsn(c0, cpnf)
  disjsn(c0, cmnf)
  pm4.56(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0))
  un00(cin(c0, csn(cpnf)), cin(c0, csn(cmnf)))
  syl6bbr(wss(c0, cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))), wceq(cin(c0, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), emptycls), wss(c0, cr), wss(c0, cdif(cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), cpr(cpnf, cmnf))))
  reldisj(c0, cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), cpr(cpnf, cmnf))
  sseq2i(c0, cr, cdif(cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), cpr(cpnf, cmnf)))
  eqtr4i(cr, cdif(cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), cdif(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)))
  mpbi(wceq(cr, cdif(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))), wceq(cin(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)), emptycls))
  renfdisj()
  disj3(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))
  difun2(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf))
  sseq2i(c0, cxr, cun(cr, cpr(cpnf, cmnf)))
  df-xr()
  bitri(w3o(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0)), wo(wo(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0)), wss(c0, cr)), w3o(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0), wss(c0, cr)))
  3orrot(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0))
  df-3or(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, c0), wss(c0, cr))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssxr(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù* ‚Üí(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚à® +‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0))
} = {
  3imtr4i(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù*, (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚à® +‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0), c0 ‚äÜ(‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { +‚àû, -‚àû }), ((+‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0)‚à® c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù))
  orrd(c0 ‚äÜ(‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { +‚àû, -‚àû }), (+‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0), c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  syl5ib(c0 ‚äÜ(‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { +‚àû, -‚àû }), ¬¨(+‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0), c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, (c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû, -‚àû })= ‚àÖ)
  syl5eq((c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû, -‚àû }), emptycls, ((c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû })‚ãÉ(c0 ‚ãÇ { -‚àû })), ¬¨(+‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0))
  eqtri((c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû, -‚àû }), ((c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû })‚ãÉ(c0 ‚ãÇ { -‚àû })), (c0 ‚ãÇ({ +‚àû } ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })))
  ineq2i(c0, { +‚àû, -‚àû }, ({ +‚àû } ‚ãÉ { -‚àû }))
  df-pr(cpnf, cmnf)
  indi(c0, { +‚àû }, { -‚àû })
  3imtr3i(¬¨(+‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0), ((c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû })‚ãÉ(c0 ‚ãÇ { -‚àû }))= ‚àÖ, (¬¨ +‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚àß ¬¨ -‚àû ‚àà c0), ((c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû })= ‚àÖ ‚àß(c0 ‚ãÇ { -‚àû })= ‚àÖ))
  biimpri((¬¨ +‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚àß ¬¨ -‚àû ‚àà c0), ((c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû })= ‚àÖ ‚àß(c0 ‚ãÇ { -‚àû })= ‚àÖ))
  anbi12i((c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû })= ‚àÖ, (c0 ‚ãÇ { -‚àû })= ‚àÖ, ¬¨ +‚àû ‚àà c0, ¬¨ -‚àû ‚àà c0)
  disjsn(c0, cpnf)
  disjsn(c0, cmnf)
  pm4.56(+‚àû ‚àà c0, -‚àû ‚àà c0)
  un00((c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû }), (c0 ‚ãÇ { -‚àû }))
  syl6bbr(c0 ‚äÜ(‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { +‚àû, -‚àû }), (c0 ‚ãÇ { +‚àû, -‚àû })= ‚àÖ, c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, c0 ‚äÜ((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { +‚àû, -‚àû })\ { +‚àû, -‚àû }))
  reldisj(c0, (‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { +‚àû, -‚àû }), { +‚àû, -‚àû })
  sseq2i(c0, cr, ((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { +‚àû, -‚àû })\ { +‚àû, -‚àû }))
  eqtr4i(cr, ((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { +‚àû, -‚àû })\ { +‚àû, -‚àû }), (‚Ñù \ { +‚àû, -‚àû }))
  mpbi(‚Ñù =(‚Ñù \ { +‚àû, -‚àû }), (‚Ñù ‚ãÇ { +‚àû, -‚àû })= ‚àÖ)

  disj3(cr, { +‚àû, -‚àû })

  bitri((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚à® +‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0), ((+‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0)‚à® c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù), (+‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® -‚àû ‚àà c0 ‚à® c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù))

  df-3or(+‚àû ‚àà c0, -‚àû ‚àà c0, c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
}

blocks.name: ltxrlt
blocks.content: The standard less-than ` <RR ` and the extended real less-than ` < ` are identical when restricted to the non-extended reals ` RR ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltxrlt(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1)))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1)), wn(wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1)))
  con2i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1))
  sylbi(wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1), wn(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))), wo(wbr(c0, cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), c1), wbr(c0, cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), c1)))
  brun(c0, cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), c1)
  jaoi(wbr(c0, cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), c1), wbr(c0, cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), c1), wn(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))))
  simplbiim(wbr(c0, cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), c1), wn(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))), wcel(c0, cun(cr, csn(cmnf))), wcel(c1, csn(cpnf)))
  brxp(c0, cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf), c1)
  syl(wcel(c1, csn(cpnf)), wn(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))), wceq(c1, cpnf))
  elsni(c1, cpnf)
  mtoi(wceq(c1, cpnf), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cpnf, cr))
  neli(cpnf, cr)
  pnfnre()
  syl5ib(wceq(c1, cpnf), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cpnf, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  eleq1(c1, cpnf, cr)
  sylbi(wbr(c0, cxp(csn(cmnf), cr), c1), wn(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))), wa(wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(c1, cr)))
  brxp(c0, csn(cmnf), cr, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))))
  syl(wcel(c0, csn(cmnf)), wn(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))), wceq(c0, cmnf))
  elsni(c0, cmnf)
  mtoi(wceq(c0, cmnf), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cmnf, cr))
  neli(cmnf, cr)
  mnfnre()
  syl5ib(wceq(c0, cmnf), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cmnf, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  eleq1(c0, cmnf, cr)
  syl6rbbr(wn(wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1), wi(wn(wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1)), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1)))
  biimt(wn(wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1)), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1))
  3bitri(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wi(wn(wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1)), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1)), wbr(c0, cun(cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1))))), c1), wo(wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1)))
  breqi(c0, clt, c1, cun(cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1))))))
  equncomi(clt, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))))
  df-ltxr(hs0, hs1)
  brun(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1)
  df-or(wbr(c0, cun(cxp(cun(cr, csn(cmnf)), csn(cpnf)), cxp(csn(cmnf), cr)), c1), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1))
  baibr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1))
  brab2a(hs0, hs1, c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))), c1, cr, cr, wbr(c0, cltrr, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))
  breq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c1, cltrr)
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1))))
  df-3an(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cltrr, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cltrr, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(c0, cltrr, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ltxrlt(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)‚Üí(c0[<]c1 ‚Üî c0[<]c1))
} = {
  bitr4d((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), c0[<]c1, c0[<]c1, c0[{ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}]c1)
  syl((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (c0[<]c1 ‚Üî c0[{ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}]c1), ¬¨ c0[(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))]c1)
  con2i((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), c0[(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))]c1)
  sylbi(c0[(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))]c1, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (c0[((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })]c1 ‚à® c0[({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù)]c1))
  brun(c0, ((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû }), ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù), c1)
  jaoi(c0[((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })]c1, c0[({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù)]c1, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  simplbiim(c0[((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })]c1, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), c0 ‚àà(‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû }), c1 ‚àà { +‚àû })
  brxp(c0, (‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû }), { +‚àû }, c1)
  syl(c1 ‚àà { +‚àû }, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), c1 = +‚àû)
  elsni(c1, cpnf)
  mtoi(c1 = +‚àû, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), +‚àû ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  neli(cpnf, cr)
  pnfnre()
  syl5ib(c1 = +‚àû, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), +‚àû ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  eleq1(c1, cpnf, cr)
  sylbi(c0[({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù)]c1, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (c0 ‚àà { -‚àû } ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  brxp(c0, { -‚àû }, cr, c1)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà { -‚àû }, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  syl(c0 ‚àà { -‚àû }, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), c0 = -‚àû)
  elsni(c0, cmnf)
  mtoi(c0 = -‚àû, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), -‚àû ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  neli(cmnf, cr)
  mnfnre()
  syl5ib(c0 = -‚àû, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), -‚àû ‚àà ‚Ñù, c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  eleq1(c0, cmnf, cr)
  syl6rbbr(¬¨ c0[(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))]c1, c0[<]c1, c0[{ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}]c1, (¬¨ c0[(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))]c1 ‚Üí c0[{ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}]c1))
  biimt(¬¨ c0[(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))]c1, c0[{ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}]c1)
  3bitri(c0[<]c1, (¬¨ c0[(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))]c1 ‚Üí c0[{ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}]c1), c0[((((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))‚ãÉ { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)})]c1, (c0[(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))]c1 ‚à® c0[{ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}]c1))
  breqi(c0, clt, c1, ((((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))‚ãÉ { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}))
  equncomi(clt, (((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù)), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)})
  df-ltxr(hs0, hs1)
  brun(c0, (((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù)), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}, c1)
  df-or(c0[(((‚Ñù ‚ãÉ { -‚àû })√ó { +‚àû })‚ãÉ({ -‚àû } √ó ‚Ñù))]c1, c0[{ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}]c1)
  baibr((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), c0[<]c1, c0[{ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}]c1)
  brab2a(hs0, hs1, c0, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1)}, c1, cr, cr, c0[<]c1, hs0[<]hs1)
  breq12(hs0, c0, hs1, c1, cltrr)
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs0[<]hs1), ((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)‚àß hs0[<]hs1))
  df-3an(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs0[<]hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[<]c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0[<]c1)
}
